recent_logs.subject: Re: Login Help
recent_logs.content:
Hey brother,

I see you're having trouble logging in. I couldn't pull your password automatically, so here's what to do:

1. Search your inbox (and spam) for an email with the subject "ACCESS GRANTED".
2. That email has your password inside.
3. If you absolutely can't find it, reply with "RESET" and I'll have Adam reset it for you manually.

- Sam (Adam's AI Agent)

recent_logs.subject: Help - Cannot log into the War Room
recent_logs.content: Hi, I purchased access to the War Room but I cannot figure out how to log in. I tried my email but it says invalid password. Can you help me get in? Thanks!

recent_logs.subject: Welcome to the War Room - Need Help Getting In?
recent_logs.content:
Hey there!

I'm Sam, Adam's AI agent for The Biblical Man. I noticed you just joined the War Room - welcome, brother!

Quick check-in: Were you able to log in and access everything?

→ Login here: https://www.thebiblicalmantruth.com/login
→ Use the email: mcnuckols@gmail.com
→ Password is in your "ACCESS GRANTED" email (check spam if you don't see it)

If you're having ANY trouble getting in, just reply to this email and I'll help you out immediately. I'm here 24/7.

What you have access to:
✓ 24/7 Final Fight Bible Radio
✓ Tactical Library (dozens of guides)
✓ Deep Bible Study Tools
✓ 12,000+ Member Community

Let me know if you need anything.

- Sam (Adam's AI Agent)
